name: Namissi, Blue Exarch of Tiamat, Ancient Blue Drago

description.value:
Fear

Aura 5

Enemies within the aura take a -2 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning

Standard

Reach 4

+37 vs AC; 2d8+12 damage plus 2d6 lightning damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares and knocked prone.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+37 vs AC; 2d6+12 damage..

At-Will

Standard

Namissi makes a gore attack and two claw attacks. If all three attacks hit, Namissi recharges wingclap

Encounter

Move, Encounter

Namissi flies up to 12 squares and attacks with his wings at the end of his move: reach 4, two targets; +36 vs Fortitude; 3d10+10 thunder damage. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Encounter ✦ Lightning

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Namissi's breath weapon recharges, and he uses it.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Lightning

Standard

Close burst 10

+36 vs Reflex; 4d12+22 lightning damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). Miss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.

At-Will ✦ Thunder

Standard

Close burst 3

+36 vs Fortitude; 2d10+10 thunder damage, and the target is stunned until the end of the blue dragon's next turn. Critical Hit: As above, except that the target is stunned (save ends).

Lightning

Close burst 5

Trigger: When namissi drops to 0 hit points,

+36 vs Reflex; 5d6+10 lightning damage. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter ✦ Lightning

Immediate Reaction

Area burst 4 within 20

Trigger: When hit by a ranged or area attack, encounter

Must target the triggering attacker; +36 vs Reflex; 4d6 lightning damage, and ongoing 10 lightning damage (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

At-Will

Minor

Namissi's next successful attack that deals lightning damage instead deals acid, cold, fire, or poison damage (his choice).

system.biography:
HP 1184; Bloodied 592 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist cold 20, fire 20 Immune lightning 		Init +23 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 46Fort 46Ref 44Will 43 ; if the heroes were successful in the “Corrupted Shrine” skill challenge in Encounter F1, the PCs have a +2 bonus on attacks in this encounter.
Speed 10, fly 12 (hover), overland flight 15
Ability ScoresStr 35 (+28)
Con 32 (+27)		Dex 25 (+23)
Int 31 (+26)		Wis 29 (+25)
Cha 18 (+20)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Athletics +32, Insight +30, Intimidate +25Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 35 | Insight 40
